testsuite.name: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with limited "How Did I Do?"s and an algorithmic question, and confirm that "Try Another" resets the "How Did I Do?" counter

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create a lesson with limited "How Did I Do?"s and an algorithmic question, and confirm that "Try Another" resets the "How Did I Do?" counter
